mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member(member_id, member_name, upper_division, lower_division, ad_account, office_phone_number, is_served) SELECT #{memberId}, #{memberName}, #{upperDivision}, #{lowerDivision}, #{adAccount}, #{officePhoneNumber}, 'Y' FROM DUAL WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT M.member_id FROM member M WHERE M.member_id = #{memberId})
mapper.select: SELECT member_id, member_name, upper_division, lower_division, ad_account, office_phone_number FROM member WHERE is_served = 'Y' LIMIT #{page}, #{viewSolePage}
SELECT upper_division FROM member GROUP BY upper_division
SELECT lower_division FROM member WHERE upper_division = #{upperDivision} GROUP BY lower_division
SELECT member_id, member_name, upper_division, lower_division, ad_account, office_phone_number FROM member WHERE member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET is_served = 'N', retire_date=NOW() WHERE member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.select: SELECT member_id, member_name, upper_division, lower_division, ad_account, office_phone_number FROM member WHERE is_served = 'N' LIMIT #{page}, #{viewSolePage}
SELECT COUNT(member_id) FROM member WHERE is_served = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(member_id) FROM member WHERE is_served = 'N'
